area: Rattray Head to Berwick upon Tweed (2)

forecast.wind: East 2 to 4 veering southwest 3 to 5, then veering west or northwest later, increasing 6 for a time later near Rattray Head.
forecast.sea: Mainly slight or moderate, but smooth or slight in Firth of Forth.
forecast.weather: Rain, with fog patches at first, fair later.
forecast.visibility: Moderate, occasionally very poor at first, becoming good later.
